name: Missing bullet
description:
It is a first-person action shooter game in which the player plays as a special forces soldier，The player is free to explore the surrounding area and needs to survive as long as possible，The player's initial weapons are arrows, shields, and knives，Players can kill enemies or dodge their attacks, and after killing enemies, they can pick up their guns，Make full use of the terrain and weapons and survive!
Control keys:
Right-click targeting
WASD movement
The left Shift running
Left mouse button attack
Space leaping
The left Ctrl squats
Mouse control direction
Middle mouse button switch weapons
ESC can pause
F Pick up the weapons
